body: the data from the energy balance component can be visualized as stacked values using the bar chart: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/3CskpdhAqAV2PIUEvY4keLsz-AIy*DxpN9RQmORuonXWm-fDx-pDXqtRyNa5V42Q4OtcvlC2Rn7B9jRk*Fg4l10T1f9vnBeT/Image3.png) but if the stackValue option is set as false, the bar chart component will report error: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/3CskpdhAqAXZFWWzmFtyT2vywinTgSTkur22Rl*CbPH1MFh8gIGr*LClCCDWRgE7*f3gtu2PfCRm*AQkiHXA7am-94jXABAv/Image4.png) May I ask if the data from the energy balance component can only be viewed as stacked bar chart? Thanks!
topic: stackValues option cannot be set as false for barchart when reading data from energy balance component
